Title: The Beach Towel Sentence 1: The towel was warm and soft against her skin. Sentence 2: She spread a beach towel out on the chair. Sentence 3: She loved relaxing under the sun. Sentence 4: Kate was laying out by the pool. Sentence 5: Kate could lay on that towel forever.

Title: The Trip Sentence 1: His favorite vacations were the ones he spent sailing with his son. Sentence 2: He made very good money and worked hard for it. Sentence 3: A couple times a year, he took a vacation. Sentence 4: Henry was a banker on Wall Street. Sentence 5: They loved spending time together more than anything else.
